Function reference

All functions

analyzer()
Analyze stuff
bin_variants()
Bin Variants
collapse_bsa_data()
Collapse BSA (Bulk Segregant Analysis) Data
getG_local()
get G prime stat
getPvals_local()
get g prime pvals
picker2()
Transform VCF Table for QTLseqR
runGprimeAnalysis_local()
QTLseqr like G prime analysis
runQTLseqAnalysis_local()
Identify QTL using a smoothed G statistic
sample_comparison_frame()
Create Sample Comparison Frame
set_genotype()
Set Filt_Genotype column

a simulate function
simulateSNPindex_local()
simulate snp index

Tidy data from gds file
tile_metrics()
Tile Metrics Dataframe
tricubeStat_local()
calc tricube stat
